audit_1.Description: How often do you have a drink containing alcohol?

audit_2.Description: How many drinks containing alcohol do you have on a typical day when you are drinking?

audit_3.Description: How often do you have six or more drinks on one occassion?

audit_4.Description: How often during the last year have you found that you were not able to stop drinking once you had started?

audit_5.Description: How often during the last year have you failed to do what was normally expected of you because of drinking?

audit_6.Description: How often during the last year have you needed a first drink in the morning to get yourself going after a heavy drinking session?

audit_7.Description: How often during the last year have you had a feeling of guilt or remorse after drinking?

audit_8.Description: How often during the last year have you been unable to remember what happened the night before because of your drinking?

audit_9.Description: Have you or someone else been injured because of your drinking?

Levels.2: Yes, but not in the last year

audit_10.Description: Has a relative, friend, doctor, or other health care worker been concerned about your drinking or suggested you cut down?

Levels.2: Yes, but not in the last year
